lines.gurmukhi: nYhr kutMb qij ibAwhy ssurwr jwie; gunnu kY kulwbDU ibrd khwveI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Just as a girl leaves her parent's house after getting married and earns a respectable name for herself and her husband's family by virtue of her good traits;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: nYhr kutMb qij ibAwhy ssurwr jwie ivAwihAwˆ jwx qy puqRI ipauky prvwr nUM iqAwg ky sOhry Gr jwˆdI hY[ qwˆ gunn kY guxwˆ dy kwrx kulwbDU ibrd khwveI kul bhU sRySt kul dI vOhtI vwly ibrd suj`s kIrqI AQvw pRisDI dÍwry kihx ivc AOˆdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: purn piqbRiq Aau gur jn syvw Bwie; igRh mY igRhysuir sujsu pRgtwveI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Earns the honourable title of all in all and revered one, by devotedly serving her elders and remaining loyal and faithful to her partner;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Aru AYsw hI pUrn piqbRq pqI dy nwl hI inBn dw brq iekrwr pRiqgÎw pUrn krdI pwldI hoeI Aau gur jn syvw Bwie qQw gurU jnwˆ vfikAwˆ vf vfyirAwˆ s`s sOhry jyT Awidkwˆ dI pRym Bwv nwl syvw krdI hoeI Es dw igRh mY igRhysuir Gr ivc Gr dI mwlk hox dw sujsu pRgtwveI sRySt j`s DMn DMn dI Awvwz hI sBnI pwsIˆ pRgt ho AwieAw krdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: AMq kwil jwie ipRA sMig sihgwmnI huie; lok prlok ibKY aUc pd pwveI [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Departs from this world as an honourable companion of her husband and earns name for herself here and in world hereafter;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ies qrHwˆ gRih Drm dw pwln krdI krdI 'AMqkwil jwie ipRA sMig shgwimnI' huie EVk nUM Apxy pÎwry pqI dy nwl hI Es dI swQn hI bx jwieAw krdI hY[ Aqy ieauˆ auh 'lok prlok ibKY aUc pd pwveI'

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuK mwrg BY Bwie inrbwhu krY; DMn gurisK Awid AMq ThrwveI [119[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: So is a Sikh of Guru worthy of praise and adulations from beginning to end who treads the path of the Guru, lives life in the reverential fear of the Lord. (119)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Es gurU ky is`K dw BI DMn DMn jY jY kwr kIrqI huMdI hY qy Awid AMq ivKy Es dw j`s At`l rihMdw hY vw aus dw Awid AMq sdIv leI hI Tihrxw kYm rihxw AQvw Es dw moKpd vwsI hoxw hoieAw krdw hY ]119]
